job.title: Property Marketing Coordinator
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Financial Services,Real Estate
job.description: responsibilities ltbrgtltbrgtresponsible for preparing marketing materials information packages as well as other administrative duties acts as a liaison between clients and other teams ltbrgtltbrgtessential duties and responsibilities ltbrgtltbrgtmaintains cbre brand product and client messaging and consistency by applying templates to produce marketing materials including flyers proposals and marketing packages for multifamily properties errors in judgment may cause short to mediumterm impact to coworkers supervisor department and line of business ltbrgtltbrgtcoordinates property tours with local management companies and potential investors ltbrgtltbrgtperforms market research writes content and edits property photos used in marketing packages ltbrgtltbrgtresponsible for creating campaign email releases as well as custom packages and templates for unique deals and portfolios while being responsible for delivery of collateral to specialists ltbrgtltbrgtupdates and maintains various information databases and generates standard and ad hoc reports as required ltbrgtltbrgtorganizes the preparation and production of customized client specific property information packages in response to requests for information rfis and requests for proposals rfps ltbrgtltbrgtabstracts purchasing letters of intent to create offer summaries for campaigns ltbrgtltbrgthandles small portion of pipeline by communicating with external teams and clients during the valuation process ltbrgtltbrgtother duties may be assigned ltbrgtltbrgtsupervisory responsibilities ltbrgtltbrgtno formal supervisory responsibilities in this position
